item.title: Time Saved
item.description: Our Client’s IT Ops teams, using ResultGrid’s Agile Acceleration continuos integration/deployment tools and services saves 1,000’s of hours yearly.

item.title: Increased Revenue
item.description: Our client’s executives use ResultGrid’s custom-developed Sales Enablement business web app in customer demos to achieve decisive market differentiation which enabled $100,000’s in additional sales

item.title: Increased Throughput
item.description: Our client’s Tech delivery team - Developers, System Admins, Performance Testers - collectively used ResultGrid’s Big Data Analytics solutions and services to increase the throughput of their digital media processing platform by 20X.
